43  struct Iterators;

56  template <template <int, int> class DH, int spacedim, bool lda>
57  struct Iterators<DH<1, spacedim>, lda>
58  {
59  typedef DH<1,spacedim> DoFHandler_type;
60  typedef ::DoFCellAccessor<DoFHandler_type, lda> CellAccessor;
61  typedef ::DoFAccessor<0,DoFHandler_type, lda> FaceAccessor;
62 
63  typedef TriaRawIterator <CellAccessor> raw_line_iterator;
64  typedef TriaIterator <CellAccessor> line_iterator;
65  typedef TriaActiveIterator<CellAccessor> active_line_iterator;
66 
67  typedef TriaRawIterator <InvalidAccessor<2,1,spacedim> > raw_quad_iterator;
68  typedef TriaIterator <InvalidAccessor<2,1,spacedim> > quad_iterator;
69  typedef TriaActiveIterator<InvalidAccessor<2,1,spacedim> > active_quad_iterator;
70 
71  typedef TriaRawIterator <InvalidAccessor<3,1,spacedim> > raw_hex_iterator;
72  typedef TriaIterator <InvalidAccessor<3,1,spacedim> > hex_iterator;
73  typedef TriaActiveIterator<InvalidAccessor<3,1,spacedim> > active_hex_iterator;
74 
75  typedef raw_line_iterator raw_cell_iterator;
76  typedef line_iterator cell_iterator;
77  typedef active_line_iterator active_cell_iterator;
78 
79  typedef TriaRawIterator <FaceAccessor> raw_face_iterator;
80  typedef TriaIterator <FaceAccessor> face_iterator;
81  typedef TriaActiveIterator<FaceAccessor> active_face_iterator;
82  };
83

97  template <template <int, int> class DH, int spacedim, bool lda>
98  struct Iterators<DH<2, spacedim>, lda>
99  {
100  typedef DH<2,spacedim> DoFHandler_type;
101  typedef ::DoFCellAccessor<DoFHandler_type, lda> CellAccessor;
102  typedef ::DoFAccessor<1, DoFHandler_type, lda> FaceAccessor;
103 
104  typedef TriaRawIterator <FaceAccessor> raw_line_iterator;
105  typedef TriaIterator <FaceAccessor> line_iterator;
106  typedef TriaActiveIterator<FaceAccessor> active_line_iterator;
107 
108  typedef TriaRawIterator <CellAccessor> raw_quad_iterator;
109  typedef TriaIterator <CellAccessor> quad_iterator;
110  typedef TriaActiveIterator<CellAccessor> active_quad_iterator;
111 
112  typedef TriaRawIterator <InvalidAccessor<3,2,spacedim> > raw_hex_iterator;
113  typedef TriaIterator <InvalidAccessor<3,2,spacedim> > hex_iterator;
114  typedef TriaActiveIterator<InvalidAccessor<3,2,spacedim> > active_hex_iterator;
115 
116  typedef raw_quad_iterator raw_cell_iterator;
117  typedef quad_iterator cell_iterator;
118  typedef active_quad_iterator active_cell_iterator;
119 
120  typedef raw_line_iterator raw_face_iterator;
121  typedef line_iterator face_iterator;

123  };

138  template <template <int, int> class DH, int spacedim, bool lda>
139  struct Iterators<DH<3, spacedim>, lda>
140  {
141  typedef DH<3, spacedim> DoFHandler_type;
142  typedef ::DoFCellAccessor<DoFHandler_type, lda> CellAccessor;
143  typedef ::DoFAccessor<2, DoFHandler_type, lda> FaceAccessor;
144 
145  typedef TriaRawIterator <::DoFAccessor<1, DoFHandler_type, lda> > raw_line_iterator;
146  typedef TriaIterator <::DoFAccessor<1, DoFHandler_type, lda> > line_iterator;
147  typedef TriaActiveIterator<::DoFAccessor<1, DoFHandler_type, lda> > active_line_iterator;
148

151  typedef TriaActiveIterator<FaceAccessor> active_quad_iterator;
